body_html: Is there a solution for this now -- I am Ok even with using older versions of tensorflow as I need this feature badly. With "monolithic" build , I am unable to load graphs on specific GPUs using SetDefaultDevice(). This looks like a very serious limitation -- that was pointed out two years ago here #5379 -- and still not solved !?

With "monolithic" build , I am unable to load graphs on specific GPUs using SetDefaultDevice(). This looks like a very serious limitation -- that was pointed out two years ago here #5379  -- and still not solved !?
body: Is there a solution for this now -- I am Ok even with using older versions of tensorflow as I need this feature badly. With "monolithic" build , I am unable to load graphs on specific GPUs using SetDefaultDevice(). This looks like a very serious limitation -- that was pointed out two years ago here https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/5379  -- and still not solved !?
